title: Binary Search
description: Implement the binary search algorithm to efficiently find a target value in a sorted array. Return the index of the target, or -1 if the target is not found.
constraints: Input array is sorted in ascending order.
Must use an iterative or recursive binary search approach.
hints: Calculate the 'mid' index in each iteration: `mid = (low + high) // 2`.
Adjust 'low' or 'high' based on the comparison with the target.
